metadata.description: The renowned shock master presents a wild new mini-series! William F. Nolan, the creator of Logan's Run, provides outstanding adaptations of some of his best horror stories, spanning all aspects of his career. Join the creepy shenanigans as characters struggle to deal with sentient pool creatures, giant men, blood sacrifices, vampires, killers, and more!
metadata.name: Tales From William F. Nolan's Dark Universe
